Why Belmont Homeowners Choose Maia Construction

Belmont homeowners deserve the best when it comes to home improvement. At Maia Construction, we bring over a decade of experience and expert craftsmanship to every project in Middlesex County.

Located just 18 miles from our headquarters in Marlborough, we provide fast response times and personalized service to Belmont residents. Whether you need new siding to protect against harsh New England winters, energy-efficient windows to reduce your heating bills, or a beautiful new entry door to enhance your curb appeal, we have you covered.

Our team understands the unique challenges that homes in Belmont and Middlesex County face. From coastal humidity to winter snow loads, we select materials and installation techniques specifically suited to your local conditions.

Frequently Asked Questions - Belmont, MA

Do you serve all of Belmont, Massachusetts?

Yes! We proudly serve all neighborhoods throughout Belmont, Middlesex County, including 02478 and surrounding zip codes. We're just 18 miles from your location.

How quickly can you start a project in Belmont?

We typically provide free estimates within 24-48 hours for Belmont residents. Project start times vary by season, but we always work with your schedule to find convenient dates.

Are you licensed and insured to work in Belmont?

Absolutely. Maia Construction is fully licensed and insured to provide siding, door, and window installation services throughout Middlesex County, including Belmont.

What makes your services different in Belmont?

We understand Belmont's specific climate challenges and architectural styles. Our materials and techniques are specifically chosen for optimal performance in Middlesex County's weather conditions.

Do you offer warranties on work done in Belmont?

Yes! All our installations in Belmont come with comprehensive warranties on both materials and workmanship. We stand behind every project.
